Package com.nnk.springboot.services

Class RatingService

java.lang.Object
com.nnk.springboot.services.RatingService
@Service
@Transactional
public class RatingService
extends java.lang.Object
The service provides methods that get called by the RatingController for CRUD operations.
Author:
SimonC.
See Also:
RatingController, RatingRepository

    • getRatingById

      public Rating getRatingById​(java.lang.Integer id)
      Get a rating from its id.
      Parameters:
      id - The rating id to get.
      Returns:
      An optional which may or may not contain the rating. If a rating is present, isPresent() returns true. If no rating is present, the object is considered empty and isPresent() returns false.

    • saveRating

      public Rating saveRating​(Rating rating)
      Save a rating.
      Parameters:
      rating - The rating to save.
      Returns:
      The rating saved.

    • updateRating

      Update a rating.
      Parameters:
      id - The rating id to update.
      rating - The rating to update.
      Returns:
      The updated rating saved.
